S06n573:1: atha khalvāyuṣmān subhūtirbhagavantametadavocat-avinivartanīyasya bhagavan bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya ke ākārāḥ,
S06n573:4: kathaṃ vā bhagavan vayaṃ jānīyāma ayamavinivartanīyo bodhisattvo mahāsattva iti?
S06n573:10: sarvāścaitāstathatāyā advayā advaidhīkārā avikalpā nirvikalpā iti tāṃ tathatāṃ tāṃ dharmatāmavataranti |
S06n573:11: tathatāyāṃ sthitastathatāṃ na kalpayati na vikalpayati,
S06n573:13: evamavatīrṇo yathātathatāṃ śrutvāpi tato'pi cāpakramya na kāṅkṣati na vimatiṃ karoti,
S06n573:20: ebhiḥ subhūte ākārairebhirliṅgairebhirnimittaiḥ samanvāgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvo'vinivartanīyo'nuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodherdhārayitavyaḥ ||
S06n573:21: punaraparaṃ subhūte avinivartanīyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo nānyeṣāṃ śramaṇānāṃ brāhmaṇānāṃ vā mukhamullokayati-ime bhagavantaḥ śramaṇā brāhmaṇā vā jñeyaṃ jānanti,
S06n573:24: na cānyebhyo devebhyaḥ puṣpaṃ vā dhūpaṃ vā gandhaṃ vā mālyaṃ vā vilepanaṃ vā cūrṇaṃ vā vastraṃ vā chatraṃ vā dhvajaṃ vā ghaṇṭāṃ vā patākāṃ vā dīpaṃ vā dātavyaṃ manyate,
S06n573:26: ebhirapi subhūte ākārairebhirliṅgairebhirnimittaiḥ samanvāgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvo'vinivartanīyo'nuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodherdhārayitavyaḥ |
S06n573:27: sa khalu punaḥ subhūte avinivartanīyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo nāpāyeṣūpapadyate,
S06n573:29: punaraparaṃ subhūte avinivartanīyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo daśakuśalān karmapathān samādāya vartate |
S06n573:52: evaṃ khalu subhūte avinivartanīyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ svayaṃ ca daśakuśalān karmapathān samādāya vartate,
S06n573:53: parānapi ca daśakuśaleṣu karmapatheṣu saṃdarśayati samādāpayati samuttejayati saṃpraharṣayati pratiṣṭhāpayati dṛḍhīkaroti |
S06n573:54: sa svapnāntaragato'pi daśakuśalān karmapathānekaikato vā bāhulyato vā sarveṇa sarvaṃ sarvathā sarvaṃ nādhyāpadyate,
S06n573:56: tasya khalu punaḥ subhūte avinivartanīyasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya svapnāntaragatasyāpi daśakuśalāḥ karmapathā āmukhībhavanti |
S06n573:57: ebhirapi subhūte ākārairebhirliṅgairebhirnimittaiḥ samanvāgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvo'vinivartanīyo'nuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodherdhārayitavyaḥ ||
S06n573:58: punaraparaṃ subhūte avinivartanīyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo yaṃ yaṃ dharmaṃ paryavāpnoti,
S06n573:61: dadāti ca-imamahaṃ dharmaṃ sarvasattvānāmarthāya paryavāpnomi dadāmi ca,
S06n573:64: anayā dharmadeśanayā dhārmikā abhiprāyāḥ sarvasattvānāṃ paripūryantāmiti |
S06n573:66: ebhirapi subhūte ākārairebhirliṅgairebhirnimittaiḥ samanvāgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvo'vinivartanīyo'nuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodherdhārayitavyaḥ ||
S06n573:67: punaraparaṃ subhūte avinivartanīyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo gambhīreṣu dharmeṣu bhāṣyamāṇeṣu na kāṅkṣati,
S06n573:75: so'bhikrāman vā pratikrāman vā na bhrāntacitto'bhikrāmati vā,
S06n573:84: na ca sahasā pādaṃ bhūmau nikṣipati,
S06n573:86: tasya khalu punaḥ subhūte avinivartanīyasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya śarīre cīvaraparibhogo na yūkilo bhavati |
S06n573:90: yāni khalu punaranyeṣāṃ sattvānāmaśītiḥ kṛmikulasahasrāṇi kāye saṃbhavanti,
S06n573:91: tāni tasya kāye sarveṇa sarvaṃ sarvathā sarvaṃ na saṃbhavanti |
S06n573:93: tathā hi tasya tāni kuśalamūlāni sarvalokābhyudgatāni bhavanti ||
S06n573:94: yathā yathā ca tasya tāni kuśalamūlāni vivardhante,
S06n573:95: tathā tathā sa bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ kāyapariśuddhiṃ ca parigṛhṇīte,
S06n573:99: bhagavānāha-yathā yathā subhūte tasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya tāni kuśalamūlāni vivardhante,
S06n573:100: tathā tathā sa bodhisattvo mahāsattvaścittālpakṛtyatāṃ ca parigṛhṇīte,
S06n573:101: cittāśāṭhyatāṃ ca cittāmāyāvitāṃ ca cittākuṭilatāṃ cittāvaṅkatāṃ ca parigṛhṇīte,
S06n573:102: yayā ca subhūte cittapariśuddhyā śrāvakapratyekabuddhabhūmimatikrānto bhavati |
S06n573:103: iyaṃ subhūte tasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya cittapariśuddhirveditavyā |
S06n573:104: ebhirapi subhūte ākārairebhirliṅgairebhirnimittaiḥ samanvāgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvo'vinivartanīyo'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodherdhārayitavyaḥ ||
S06n573:105: punaraparaṃ subhūte avinivartanīyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na lābhasatkāraślokaguruko bhavati,
S06n573:108: na ca gambhīreṣu dharmeṣu bhāṣyamāṇeṣu saṃsīdati |
S06n573:112: yaṃ ca satkṛtya parato dharmaṃ śṛṇoti,
S06n573:119: ebhirapi subhūte ākārairebhirliṅgairebhirnimittaiḥ samanvāgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ avinivartanīyo'nuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodherdhārayitavyaḥ ||
S06n573:120: punaraparaṃ subhūte māraḥ pāpīyānaṣṭau mahānirayānabhinirmāya tatra ekaikasmin mahāniraye bahūni bodhisattvaśatāni bahūni bodhisattvasahasrāṇi bahūni bodhisattvaśatasahasrāṇyabhinirmāya avinivartanīyaṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvamevaṃ vadet-ye tathāgatena avinivartanīyā bodhisattvā mahāsattvā vyākṛtāḥ,
S06n573:129: sacedevamapi bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya cittaṃ na kṣubhyati,
S06n573:133: ebhirapi subhūte ākārairebhirliṅgairebhirnimittaiḥ samanvāgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvo'vinivartanīyo'nuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodherdhārayitavyaḥ ||
S06n573:134: punaraparaṃ subhūte māraḥ pāpīyān śramaṇaveṣeṇa avinivartanīyaṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvamupasaṃkramyaivaṃ vakṣyati-yadetattvayā pūrvaṃ śrutaṃ tatpratideśaya,
S06n573:149: sacetpunaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na kṣubhyati na calati,
S06n573:150: śrutvāpi cemāṃ vācaṃ mārasya pāpīyasaḥ dharmatāmeva pratisarati,
S06n573:153: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte arhan bhikṣuḥ kṣīṇāsravo na parasya śraddhayā gacchati dharmatāyāṃ pratyakṣakārī |
S06n573:155: evameva subhūte avinivartanīyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo'navamardanīyaḥ śrāvakayānikaiḥ pudgalaiḥ pratyekabuddhayānikaiśca |
S06n573:157: śrāvakabhūmau vā pratyekabuddhabhūmau vā niyato bhavati sarvajñatāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhiparāyaṇaḥ |
S06n573:158: sa khalu punaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo yadā avinivartanīyadhātau sthito bhavati,
S06n573:160: ebhirapi subhūte ākārairebhirliṅgairebhirnimittaiḥ samanvāgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvo'vinivartanīyo'nuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodherdhārayitavyaḥ ||
S06n573:161: punaraparaṃ subhūte avinivartanīyaṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvamupasaṃkramya kaścidevaṃ vakṣyatisaṃsāracārikaiṣā,
S06n573:166: kutaḥ punastvamanyamātmabhāvaṃ parigrahītavyaṃ manyase iti vā |
S06n573:168: tamenaṃ māraḥ pāpīyān svayamevaṃ vakṣyati-icchasi tvaṃ draṣṭuṃ tān bodhisattvān mahāsattvān yairgaṅgānadīvālukopamān kalpān buddhā bhagavantaḥ pratyupasthitāścīvarapiṇḍapātaśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkāraiḥ,
S06n573:170: gaṅgānadīvālukopamā eva buddhā bhagavantaḥ paryupāsitāḥ paripṛṣṭāḥ paripraśnīkṛtāśca asyaiva bodhisattvayānasyārthāya kathaṃ bodhisattvairmahāsattvaiḥ sthātavyamiti?
S06n573:173: tathāpi sthitvā tathā caritvā tathaiva yogamāpadya adyāpi taireva tāvanna anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhirabhisaṃbuddhā |
S06n573:174: tathā avavādānuśāsanyāṃ sthitaistathā śikṣamāṇaiḥ sarvajñatā nānuprāptā |
S06n573:177: taṃ māraḥ pāpīyāṃstasminneva pṛthivīpradeśe bhikṣūnabhinirmāyaivaṃ vakṣyati-ete bhikṣavo'rhantaḥ kṣīṇāsravāḥ saṃvṛttāḥ,
S06n573:181: sacetkhalu punarevamapi bhāṣyamāṇe evaṃ nirdiśyamāne bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya cittaṃ na kṣubhyati na calati,
S06n573:183: sacedbodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya cittaṃ parataḥ śrutvaivaṃ vivekapadāni dharmatāyā na parihīyate,
S06n573:186: tāni ca sarvāṇi mārakarmāṇi tathā saṃjānāti-asthānaṃ subhūte anavakāśaḥ,
S06n573:187: yatsa bodhisattvo mahāsattvastathā caran pāramitāsu na sarvajñatāmanuprāpnuyāt-asthānametadanavakāśo yattathā caratastathā śikṣamāṇasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya yathā tathāgatairākhyātaṃ tayā caryayā avirahitasya ebhiḥ pāramitāpratisaṃyuktairmanasikārairviharato māraḥ pāpīyānnāvatāraṃ lapsyate |
S06n573:193: ebhirapi subhūte ākārairebhirliṅgairebhirnimittaiḥ samanvāgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvo'vinivartanīyo'nuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodherdhārayitavyaḥ ||
S06n573:194: punaraparaṃ subhūte avinivartanīyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na rūpasaṃjñāmabhisaṃskāroti,
S06n573:196: evaṃ na vedanāsaṃjñāṃ na saṃjñāsaṃjñāṃ na saṃskārasaṃjñām |
S06n573:202: tata ucyate anutpādajñānakṣāntiko bodhisattvo mahāsattvo'vinivartanīya iti |
S06n573:203: ebhirapi subhūte ākārairebhirliṅgairebhirnimittaiḥ samanvāgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvo'vinivartanīyo'nuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodherdhārayitavyaḥ ||
S06n573:204: punaraparaṃ subhūte māraḥ pāpīyān bhikṣuveṣeṇopasaṃkramya bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvamevaṃ vicchandayiṣyati-ākāśasamaiṣā yaduta sarvajñatā |
S06n573:217: tena kulaputreṇa vā kuladuhitrā vā evaṃ jñātavyamevaṃ samanvāhartavyamevaṃ veditavyam-mārakarmaivaitat,
S06n573:221: ebhirapi subhūte ākārairebhirliṅgairebhirnimittaiḥ samanvāgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvo'vinivartanīyo'nuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodherdhārayitavyaḥ ||
S06n573:222: punaraparaṃ subhūte avinivartanīyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ śrāvakapratyekabuddhabhūminirvṛttaḥ sarvajñatāyāṃ pravṛtto bhavati |
S06n573:224: tathā dvitīyaṃ tathā tṛtīyaṃ tathā caturthaṃ dhyānaṃ samāpadyate |
S06n573:230: idamapi subhūte avinivartanīyasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya avinivartanīyalakṣaṇaṃ veditavyam ||
S06n573:231: punaraparaṃ subhūte avinivartanīyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na nāmaguruko bhavati,
S06n573:241: nāsya bhavatyadhimātraḥ kāmeṣu kāmābhiṣvaṅgo vā abhiprāyo vā |
S06n573:244: tadyathāpi subhūte caurakāntāramadhyagataḥ puruṣaḥ āhārakṛtyaṃ kurvannutrastasaṃjñyevāhāraṃ kuryāt,
S06n573:246: kadā nu khalu nāma ahamitaścaurakāntārādatikrānto bhaviṣyāmītyevaṃsaṃjñī aviśrabdhamāhāramāharati |
S06n573:247: evameva subhūte avinivartanīyā bodhisattvā mahāsattvā agāramadhyāvasanto yān yāneva kāmān paribhuñjate,
S06n573:248: tāṃstānanarthikā eva agṛddhā eva asaktā eva kāmān paribhuñjate |
S06n573:249: anarthikā eva ca te bhavanti priyarūpasātarūpaiḥ pañcabhiḥ kāmaguṇaiḥ |
S06n573:254: tathā hi taiḥ satpuruṣairmahāpuruṣairatipuruṣaiḥ puruṣapravaraiḥ puruṣaśobhanaiḥ puruṣarṣabhaiḥ puruṣodāraiḥ puruṣaśauṭīraiḥ puruṣapuṃgavaiḥ puruṣadhuryaiḥ puruṣapadmaiḥ puruṣapuṇḍarīkaiḥ puruṣājāneyaiḥ puruṣanāgaiḥ puruṣasiṃhaiḥ puruṣadamyasārathibhiḥ sarvasattvāḥ paramasukhe niyojayitavyāḥ |
S06n573:255: evaṃ hi subhūte agāramadhyāvasanti bodhisattvā mahāsattvā yathāpi nāma prajñāpāramitābalādhānaprāptatvāt |
S06n573:256: ebhirapi subhūte ākārairebhirliṅgairebhirnimittaiḥ samanvāgatā bodhisattvā mahāsattvā avinivartanīyā anuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodherdhārayitavyāḥ ||
S06n573:257: punaraparaṃ subhūte avinivartanīyasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya vajrapāṇirmahāyakṣo nityānubaddho bhavati |
S06n573:266: tāni sarvāṇi sarveṇa sarvaṃ na prayojayati |
S06n573:272: sa na striyaṃ na ca puruṣaṃ vyākaroti-putro vā te bhaviṣyati,
S06n573:275: ebhirapi subhūte ākārairebhirliṅgairebhirnimittaiḥ samanvāgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvo'vinivartanīyo'nuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodherdhārayitavyaḥ ||
S06n573:276: punaraparaṃ subhūte avinivartanīyasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya ye ākārā yāni liṅgāni yāni nimittāni yairākārairyairliṅgairyairnimittaiḥ samanvāgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvo'vinivartanīyo veditavyo'nuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ,
S06n573:308: te tathāgatadarśanamevākāṅkṣanta ākāṅkṣanti anyeṣu lokadhātuṣu ye tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāstiṣṭhanti dhriyante yāpayanti,
S06n573:311: evaṃ te avirahitā bhavanti tathāgatadarśanena tathāgataparyupāsanena tathāgataparyupasthānena ca ||
S06n573:312: punaraparaṃ subhūte avinivartanīyā bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ kāmāvacarebhyo devebhyaścyutā rūpāvacarebhya ārūpyāvacarebhyo vā devebhyaścyutāḥ santaḥ ihaiva madhyadeśe jambūdvīpe pratyājāyante |
S06n573:325: ebhirapi subhūte ākārairebhirliṅgairebhirnimittaiḥ samanvāgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvo'vinivartanīyo'nuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodherdhārayitavyaḥ ||
S06n573:326: punaraparaṃ subhūte avinivartanīyasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya naivaṃ bhavati-avinivartanīyo vāham,
S06n573:331: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte srotaāpannaḥ srotaāpattiphale svakāyāṃ bhūmau na kāṅkṣati na vicikitsati |
S06n573:336: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte puruṣa ānantaryakārī ānantaryacittena avirahito bhavati,
S06n573:338: na taccittaṃ śaknoti prativinodayituṃ vā viṣkambhayituṃ vā |
S06n573:340: evameva subhūte avinivartanīyasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya avinivartanīyacittaṃ sthitaṃ bhavati,
S06n573:342: sadevamānuṣāsureṇāpi lokena na śakyaṃ cālayituṃ vā kampayituṃ vā |
S06n573:345: tasya svasyāṃ bhūmau niṣkāṅkṣasya nirvicikitsasya jātivyativṛttasyāpi na śrāvakacittaṃ na pratyekabuddhacittaṃ votpadyate |
S06n573:347: abhisaṃbhotsye evāhamanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhiṃ svasyāṃ bhūmau sthitaḥ |
S06n573:351: tathā hi sa sthito'saṃhāryeṇa cittena asaṃhāryeṇa jñānena samanvāgato bhavati |
S06n573:355: na tava te ākārāstāni liṅgāni tāni nimittāni vā saṃvidyante,
S06n573:359: veditavyametatsubhūte nāyaṃ bodhisattvo vyākṛtaḥ paurvakaistathāgatairarhadbhiḥ samyaksaṃbuddhairanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhāviti |
S06n573:365: evaṃ samanvāharati-māro batāyaṃ pāpīyān buddhādhiṣṭhānaṃ kṛtvā māṃ vivecayitukāmo'nuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodhita iti |
S06n573:367: veditavyametatsubhūte vyākṛto'yaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvo'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau paurvakaistathāgatairarhadbhiḥ samyaksaṃbuddhaiḥ |
S06n573:369: sacetsubhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya ime ākārā imāni liṅgāni imāni nimittāni saṃvidyante,
S06n573:371: addhā batāyaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvo vyākṛtaḥ paurvakaistathāgatairarhadbhiḥ samyaksaṃbuddhaiḥ |
S06n573:374: tathā hyasya te ākārāstāni liṅgāni tāni nimittāni saṃvidyante,
S06n573:376: ebhirapi subhūte ākārairebhirliṅgairebhirnimittaiḥ samanvāgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvo'vinivartanīyo'nuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodherdhārayitavyaḥ ||
S06n573:377: punaraparaṃ subhūte avinivartanīyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ saddharmaparigrahasya kṛtaśaḥ ātmaparityāgamapi karoti,
S06n573:379: tasmādbodhisattvo mahāsattvo'vinivartanīyaḥ saddharmaparigrahāya paramudyogamāpadyate atītānāgatapratyutpannānāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ premṇā ca gauraveṇa ca |
S06n573:380: dharmakāyā buddhā bhagavanta iti dharme prema ca gauravaṃ copādāya saddharmaparigrahaṃ karoti |
S06n573:383: anāgatānāmapi buddhānāṃ bhagavatāmeṣa eva saddharmaparigrahaḥ-ahamapi tatra teṣāmanāgatānāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ saṃkhyāṃ gaṇanāṃ praviṣṭa iti,
S06n573:386: sa imamapyarthavaśaṃ saṃpaśyan saddharmaparigrahasya kṛtaśa ātmaparityāgamapi karoti,
S06n573:390: ebhirapi subhūte ākārairebhirliṅgairebhirnimittaiḥ samanvāgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvo'vinivartanīyo'nuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodherdhārayitavyaḥ ||
S06n573:391: punaraparaṃ subhūte avinivartanīyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvastathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya dharmaṃ deśayato na kāṅkṣati,
S06n573:393: subhūtirāha-kiṃ tathāgatasyaiva bhagavan dharmaṃ deśayato na kāṅkṣati na vicikitsati,
S06n573:395: bhagavānāha-śrāvakasyāpi subhūte dharmaṃ deśayato na kāṅkṣati na vicikitsati |
S06n573:397: tathā hi tena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena anutpattikeṣu dharmeṣu kṣāntiḥ pratilabdhā |
S06n573:401: ebhiḥ subhūte guṇaiḥ samanvāgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvo'vinivartanīyo bhavati |
S06n573:402: imānyapi subhūte avinivartanīyasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya ākāraliṅganimittāni veditavyānyanuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheriti ||
